column4: i use ubuntu 11.10 with gnome shell. how can i pause-resume a file copy proces (without a new app) ?. i mean gnome has not this feature?
I seem to remember being able to do this in 10.10.. but I don't see it any more.. there are a lot of posts/threads/bug reports talking about it but nothing seems to be implemented
here's one discussion.. don't know if this is implemented yet http://live.gnome.org/Nautilus/ProgressWindow
